=C2=A0Yeah, been told this. I get the impres=
sion there's some joining this group hoping to get their ghost huntng or sp=
irit beliefs validated, or confirmed, when they hear this junk they bail. T=
his stuff is ITC, Instrumental Trans-Communication. That can be audio, vide=
o, or still images. I think there is a mis-conception in the paranormal wha=
tever world that EVP is ghost voice, weak whispery barely audible noise, an=
d ITC is video feedback loop images, an never shall the two ever, ever mix.=
 Some seem to think it's all perfectly well defined and laid down in laws a=
nd protocols. Afterall it's repeated on TV week after weak after week.
=C2=
=A0
=C2=A0I managed to completely offend the guy that told me about the emb=
edded images, Richard Roberts. He started laying down all these absolute un=
deniabel laws and definitions of EVP, and when I disagreed openly, he got a=
ll pissed off, deleted all his Facebook content, and went away, sulking in =
some dark internet corner I guess. I feel bad about offending him, but come=
 on! Grow up out there. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Think I'll replace the tuner in this =
box, too frikin' noisy. I don't have tuners to spare, but this one is unacc=
